data.comment: The match is underway in Nice.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Francois Letexier awards Dijon a goal kick.
In Nice, Nice push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Throw-in Dijon.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 11, Eric Ebimbe for Dijon drives towards goal at Allianz Rivera. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 15, Nice's Pierre Lees-Melou breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Francois Letexier signals a Dijon throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 17, Hicham Boudaoui for Nice is whistled offside.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Nice push forward at Allianz Rivera and Amine Gouiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dijon defence.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice's Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dijon defender.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 20, In Nice, Alexis Claude-Maurice of Nice is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Mama Balde scores to make it 0-1 at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 23, Free kick Nice.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Danilo is booked for the home team.
In the minute 25, Dijon have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Nice.
In the minute 31, Dijon have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Dijon extend their lead to 0-2 through Ngonda Muzinga.
In the minute 34, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) gets a yellow card.
Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Dijon, close to Nice's area.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Nice in the half of Dijon.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Nice.
Francois Letexier signals a Dijon throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Dijon at Allianz Rivera.
Free kick Nice.
Important block from the Dijon defence as Jeff Reine-Adelaide fires in a strike for Nice.
In the minute 44, Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 45, Francois Letexier will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Dijon's Mounir Chouiar looks ok and returns to the pitch.
At Allianz Rivera, Nice are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Allianz Rivera.
Mounir Chouiar is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second-half is underway at Allianz Rivera.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 48, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Jeff Reine-Adelaide gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nice.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 51, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Nice, Mama Balde of Dijon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 52, Francois Letexier awards Nice a goal kick.
Throw-in Dijon.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Nice.
In the minute 54, In Nice, Eric Ebimbe (Dijon) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
In the minute 56, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Dijon are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 57, Hicham Boudaoui (Nice) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dijon's Bersant Celina gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Nice in the half of Dijon.
Amine Gouiri's header is off-target for Nice.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Dijon have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 62, Dijon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nice.
Dijon needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 63, Nice make their first substitution with Alexis Trouillet replacing Kephren Thuram Ulien.
The home team have replaced Hicham Boudaoui with Rony Lopes. This is the second substitution made today by Patrick Vieira.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 65, Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Nice are on the attack at Allianz Rivera, where Rony Lopes is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Nice are coming forward and Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Dijon at Allianz Rivera.
David Linares (Dijon) is making a first substitution, with Roger Assale replacing Eric Ebimbe.
Mama Balde puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
In the minute 68, Free kick Nice.
At Allianz Rivera, Ngonda Muzinga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Nice.
In the minute 70, Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Patrick Vieira is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Rivera with Dan Ndoye replacing Alexis Claude-Maurice.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 72, Nice's Rony Lopes is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Moussa Konate is replacing Mama Balde for the away team.
Nice's Alexis Trouillet misses with an attempt on goal.
Francois Letexier awards Dijon a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Nice are pushing forward but Rony Lopes's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Dan Ndoye of Nice smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 76, Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Nice's Rony Lopes gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Nice to check on Jordan Lotomba, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 79, Nice have been awarded a penalty...
Jordan Lotomba has recovered and rejoins the match in Nice.
In the minute 80, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Nice now trail just 1-3 thanks to a Amine Gouiri spot-kick.
Francois Letexier signals a Nice throw-in in Dijon's half.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 82, In Nice Nice attack through Pierre Lees-Melou. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 83, Pape Diop (Dijon) has received a yellow card from Francois Letexier.
Dan Ndoye (Nice) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Dijon at Allianz Rivera.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) has taken off Jordan Lotomba who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Salim Ben Seghir is the replacement.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 85, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jordan Marie is replacing Mounir Chouiar for Dijon at Allianz Rivera.
Alexis Trouillet (Nice) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 87, Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Nice push upfield but Francois Letexier quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 89, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In Nice Nice drive forward through Amine Gouiri. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nice attack but Danilo's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Dijon close to the penalty box.
Didier Ndong for Dijon is back on the field again.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Free kick Nice.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Nice push forward at Allianz Rivera and Dan Ndoye gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dijon defence.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Didier Ndong.
Dijon's Moussa Konate has been booked in Nice.
